column4: I am having a little problem with python, I build a program with make (runs fine), start it with ./meld (runs fine) copy it to /usr/bin/meld, run meld get an import error?! anyone?
How did you copy meld to /usr/bin?  With make install?
first with make prefix=/usr install (like the install file told me), then with just cp to see what happens, neither worked though
Wait, why are you installing meld that way?  It's in universe.
